resources.string: Airdrops are a distribution of cryptocurrencies for free. \n when a new token or coin comes out, developers want to get attention for their project. therefore they distribute free cryptocurrencies if you help them get their name out there
I want to join an airdrop, what I need to do?

Each new cryptocurrency project have their own airdrop requirements. some may require you to only join a telegram group,\n others may require you to like them on social media or fill an online form, etc.
What can I do with tokens?
Your tokens worth money. you can either sell them immediately upon recieveing them,\n or you can wait until the tokens value will raise and sell them at a higher price.
How much tokens do I get?
Each airdrop will give you different amount of tokens. what is important is not the amount of tokens you get,\n but the total value of the tokens, so you get as much money as possible.
Can I register to an airdrop and not get my tokens?

It is possible that you would fill the airdrop requirements and not get your tokens.\n however, all airdrops listed in this app are going through a verification process. our team is working hard to ensure all airdrops delivering their promises.\n However, we can't guarantee 100% legit airdrops. To fight airdrop scammers, you can report on airdrops.
I hate ads! how can I disable them in this app?
We offer free ad removal for 7 days if you invite your friends to our app. you can do it simply by clicking \n the block icon in top-right and inviting your friends.
Join telegram, submit your code and complete an online form. Join here: "https://www.thisisasamplelink55.com"
